Side Effects: swollen hands and feet_ severe moving joint pain_ achilles pain_ pins and needles all over_ extreme anxiety_ depression_ no energy_ disconnected____i have been off of the oracae for a week and i am still not better_ i feel sick and my joints hurt horribly.
If not taken with enough food I had severe nausea and vomiting.
Comments: This product cleared up my jaw line cystic acne. I first noticed results at about 6-7 weeks. It reduced my breakouts and inflammations by about 85-90% in that area. It was used to jump start my acne regimen and I will be getting off around the 4 month mark.

I had no idea what Steven Johnson's Syndrome was until my fingers_ lips and private parts started burning and blistering. I though it was from minor exposure to the sun until I kept completely out of the sun and everything kept burning_ then blistering_ then bleeding. It was extremely painful and scary and everyone should know to watch out for this kind of reaction and stop the med/go to the ER ASAP.

Side Effects: HAD NO EFFECT ON CLEARING UP INFECTION
Comments: DID NOT WORK IN FIGHTING INFECTED THROAT. SWITCHED TO BIACTIN AND WAS BETTER IN ONE DAY_ BUT CONTINES BIACTIN FOR 9 DAYS

Side Effects: I received a horrible stomach ulcer because the doc didn't say anything about not taking this before bed. The pain was excruciating. I couldn't eat solid foods for a week. Do not take this before bed! It severely burned my stomach/esophagus. Take with lots of water_ and stay up-right for 1 hour after taking. Other than this_ no problems.
Comments: Worked great for perioral dermatitis_ and after taking Doryx for a month I didn't get the condition again for another 3 years. I also noticed while taking it that my pores disappeared and my face was clearer than it's ever been. Just be sooo careful_ it is very rough on the lining of the stomach.

Side Effects: None_ but as with many antibiotics_ makes you feel pretty crappy if you consume alcohol with it.
Comments: Used in addition to a cream.  Doryx helps breakouts heal faster.  It also_ for me_ prevents breakouts on my shoulders.  Since I only put the cream on my face_ I am positive that the Doryx is what keeps the big_ painful acne off my shoulders.  Most breakouts heal very quickly compared to not taking anything at all.  It's the creams that should prevent new breakouts.

I took this for acne on my chin. After it initially looked like it was improving_ I got big thick welts under my skin filled with brown blood and muck that I would have to burst or else they would stay there. Over a year later I still have very pale scars from it. I went to a different doctor who prescribed me a cream called Duac gel. My skin cleared up in 3-4 days to the point that people would comment how lovely my skin is. Try this if doryx doesn't work for you.
I had pretty constant acne on my chin-- that painful_ under-the-skin kind-- and Doryx has totally eliminated it.

Side Effects: Mild stool changes.  Some stomach upset.  Mild insomnia.
Comments: I was on Doryx with another drug called Plaquenil.  Plaquenil is supposed to enhance Doryx.  Doryx seems to supress some of my Lyme symptoms.  I am on Zithromax and IV Rocephin right now and the symptoms are coming back.  I can't wait to get back on Doryx.

Side Effects: My face cleared up at first then it got worse than it started as and really dry and big pimples_ but I'm still waiting for it to get better...it's only been about 3 weeks.
